<xs:annotation>
<xs:documentation>
Textual Content
This is the XML Schema Text module for XHTML

The Text module includes declarations for all core
text container elements and their attributes.

+ block phrasal
+ block structural
+ inline phrasal
+ inline structural

$Id$
</xs:documentation>

* address, blockquote, pre, h1, h2, h3, h4, h5, h6

* div, p

</xs:documentation>
